department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Tender Description and Any Attachments Of this Procurement
description: Transport Canada has a requirement for a supplier to supply and deliver a new self-propelled snowblower having a minimum 4200 tonnes per hour capacity to the airport located in St. Anthony, Newfoundland, Canada.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Reference Information
#### Request for Proposal Number
T2012-230094

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Publication Date
May 3, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date
June 28, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Date of Amendment
June 17, 2024

### Tender Details
#### Tender Title
Replacement of Snowblower

#### Goods or Services Required
Transport Canada is seeking a supplier to provide a new, self-propelled snowblower with a minimum capacity of 4200 tonnes per hour for delivery to St. Anthony Airport, Newfoundland, Canada.

#### Contracting Entity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada.

#### Contract Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.

#### Contact Information
Christopher Young (SPAC/PSPC)

* Email: [christopher.young@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.young@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice Reference Number: WS4566314696-Doc4566357557

#### Notice
Transport Canada has a need for a supplier to provide and deliver a new self-propelled snowblower with a minimum capacity of 4200 tonnes per hour to St. Anthony Airport, Newfoundland, Canada.

#### Regions of Opportunity
St. Anthony, Newfoundland, Canada.

#### Regions of Delivery
St. Anthony, Newfoundland, Canada.

#### Attachment and Preparation
No attachments or preparation are required.

#### Trade Agreements
Transport Canada accepts the following trade agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Cancellation or Revision of Tender
No information available.

#### Response and Contact Information
Suppliers who are interested in this request for proposal should submit their response to the contact
